title: String to Byte Conversion
description:
FSTRING_TO_BYTE converts a formatted string into a byte value. It sup￾ports following input formats:
2#0101 (binary), 8#345 (octal), 16#2a33 (hexadecimal) and 234 (deci￾mal).
name: FSTRING_TO_BYTE

input.name: IN
input.description: A string representation of a number, which can be in binary, octal, hexadecimal, or decimal format.

output.name: FSTRING_TO_BYTE
output.description: The byte value converted from the input string representation.

return_value.description: The byte result of the conversion based on the provided input string.
